sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Bucks Run ski trail was groomed today, March 9, 2025. Grass has started to show and the north loop of the trail is completely unusable at this time.  The current trail is approximately .5 km.  There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.
Please adhere to posted hours. Buck’s Run last day is Sunday, March 9, 2025.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Saturday. Expect firm conditions on the trails today.
nubsNob.comments: Spring skiing has arrived at Nub's Nob. Last night the temperature stayed above freezing, but it's dropping below freezing this morning. The Nub's Nob Grooming Crew held off on grooming the slopes until early this morning to leave the best snow surface possible given the thaw to freeze conditions. Please note that areas of icy conditions might be encountered today if you venture off the groomed terrain. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
